---
subcategory: "Organizations"
---

# Data Source: mongodbatlas_organization

`mongodbatlas_organization` describes all MongoDB Atlas Organizations. This represents organizations that have been created.

## Example Usage

### Using project_id attribute to query
```terraform

data "mongodbatlas_organization" "test" {
  org_id = "<org_id>"
}
```

### Required

- `org_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `api_access_list_required` (Boolean)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `is_deleted` (Boolean)
- `links` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--links))
- `multi_factor_auth_required` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
- `restrict_employee_access` (Boolean)
- `security_contact` (String)
- `skip_default_alerts_settings` (Boolean)
